original_title:
Secretary Linda McMahon
:
The Trump Admin will no longer stand by as states & school districts flout federal law.

Starting today, 5 Northern Virginia school divisions must request reimbursement for all federal ed dollars & will be classified as high risk for future federal fundin  — The Donald
article_summary: Trump Administration classifies 5 Northern Virginia school districts as high-risk for federal funding due to alleged flouting of federal education laws. This action follows accusations of labeling parents as domestic terrorists and promoting controversial policies.</s>
